title: Inter and transdisciplinarity strategies for evaluating and improving water quality monitoring systems: Uruguay as a study case
content:
Publication date: April 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 154

Author(s): Néstor Mazzeo, Ana Lía Ciganda, Camila Fernández Nion, Francisco J. Peñas, Alexia María González-Ferreras, Carolina Crisci, Cristina Zurbriggen, Daniel Pérez, José Barquin, Ismael Díaz
